step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Try to make your fists a little tighter.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
You're doing well with the outward arm movement. Focus on a smooth, controlled extension and ensure your wrists are straight.
Great job on the arm extension and muscle relaxation. Ensure your arms reach shoulder height consistently.
You're completing the repetitions well. Keep up the good work with the coordinated arm and breathing movements.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight when bringing your arms in and relax as you extend them outwards. Focus on smooth movements and coordinating your breath.
